Text: Re PGE limits Cc Please see the attached spreadsheet and be sure to read the asterisk notes on the bottom of the sheets Note that power and gas are located on separate worksheets If you have any questions please call PM Did you already send me PGEs existing limit structure

PGE Limits Document Cc Please see the attached draft limits document which was discussed at PGEs Sept th Risk Management Committee meeting Peggy asked that I forward this to you prior to your Monday conference call regarding PGE Risk Management Kristin Stathis Manager Risk Management Reporting Control

PGE Position Report Cc Hi Rod I am the manager of PGEs Risk Management Reporting Controls group reporting to Jim Piro Jim passed on to me your request to receive a weekly PGE position report which we will be sending to you each Tuesday from today forward The attached report contains net open power and gas positions compared to Enron approved limits The VaR section of the report shows our limits but we have left the actual calculation blank We are currently working with David Port to determine the best VaR solution for PGE Please email or call me at if you have any questions or need additional information

Fwd PGE Limits DocumentSee attached email to Stan Horton and draft PGE limits document I inadvertently left you off the cc list before sending this out and Peggy Fowler and Jim Lobdell wanted to be sure you saw this draft Please note that italicized items are those items Jim is awaiting your approval to change Kristin Stathis Manager Risk Management Reporting Control Original Message Date pm Friday From Kristin Stathis To Stanley Horton CC Jim Lobdell Jim Piro Mary Turina PEGGY FOWLER Rod Hayslett Terri Peschka Subject PGE Limits Document Please see the attached draft limits document which was discussed at PGEs Sept th Risk Management Committee meeting Peggy asked that I forward this to you prior to your Monday conference call regarding PGE Risk Management Kristin Stathis Manager Risk Management Reporting Control
